title: FM Radio RDS support if FM Radio APIs are brought in
body: If FM radio APIs are brought in, it would be amazing if we could get RDS support as well.  This would allow apps to say they were listening to KEXP instead only 93.1 and the station information as well.

comments.body:
Please allow developers to enable the following for WP FM radio apps:
1. RDS data access
2. FM radio recording and playback
3. Listen to FM via phone speakers
bad news. I will abandon fm dev branch.
We know the Phone supports this capability.  Please expose the API to us developers are well.  Thanks.

Please provide the ability to capture the text from the FM radio RDS subcarrier. It is present in the FM player under "Music and Videos", then "zune" and then "radio".  I would like to write an application or two for user interaction using the RDS subcarrier and a database located at the radio station. Thank you.
Enable FM radio recording and retrieval later. Enable FM radio monitoring for RDS subcarrier information through the developer API.
